Go2 Card Technical Issues

Due to technical issues with the Go2 Card plugin, the plugin has been removed from the server, and hence all tickets, ticket machines, faregates and readers are currently not functional. Faregates have been opened at all stations and travel is free network-wide in the meantime. All services are operating as usual.

HarlonTransit

HarlonTransit is the government-owned public transport operator within the city of Harlon.
